text: The flag of Guatemala City () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF ==Related pages== * Guatemala City ==References== Guatemala City Category:Guatemala City Guatemala City Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Guatemala City
